exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat The term "nat_rec (fun _ : nat => PrimRec 1) succIsPR (fun (n0 : nat) (H : (fun _ : nat => PrimRec 1) n0) => eq_refl) n" has type "PrimRec 1" while it is expected to have type "PrimRec 1" (cannot satisfy constraint "{p : PrimRec 1 | extEqual 1 (evalPrimRec 1 p) S}" == "PrimRec 1").

original: intros n. unfold isPR. exists (nat_rec (fun _ => _) (succIsPR) (fun _ _ => eq_refl) n). reflexivity.
